scripts.build: next build && next export && yarn postexport
scripts.distrelease: export NEXT_JS_RELEASE_VERSION=$SENTRY_PROJECT:$(sentry-cli releases propose-version) && yarn build && yarn release
scripts.link-hooks: cd node_modules/react && yarn link && cd ../react-query && yarn link && cd ../react-dom && yarn link && cd ../jotai && yarn link && cd ../.. && yarn link @pooltogether/hooks
scripts.unlink-hooks: cd node_modules/react && yarn unlink && cd ../react-query && yarn unlink && cd ../react-dom && yarn unlink && cd ../jotai && yarn unlink && cd ../.. && yarn unlink @pooltogether/hooks && yarn install --force
scripts.link-components: cd node_modules/react && yarn link && cd ../react-dom && yarn link && cd ../jotai && yarn link && cd ../framer-motion && yarn link  && cd ../lodash && yarn link  && cd ../next && yarn link && cd ../tailwindcss && yarn link && cd ../@pooltogether/hooks && yarn link && cd .. && cd ../.. && yarn link @pooltogether/react-components
scripts.unlink-components: cd node_modules/react && yarn unlink && cd ../react-dom && yarn unlink && cd ../jotai && yarn unlink && cd ../framer-motion  && yarn unlink && cd ../lodash  && yarn unlink && cd ../next  && yarn unlink && cd ../tailwindcss && yarn unlink && cd ../@pooltogether/hooks && yarn unlink && cd .. && cd ../.. && yarn unlink @pooltogether/react-components && yarn install --force
scripts.link-components-and-hooks: cd node_modules/react && yarn link && cd ../react-dom && yarn link && cd ../jotai && yarn link && cd ../framer-motion && yarn link && cd ../lodash && yarn link && cd ../next && yarn link && cd ../tailwindcss && yarn link && cd ../.. && yarn link @pooltogether/react-components && yarn link @pooltogether/hooks
scripts.unlink-components-and-hooks: cd node_modules/react && yarn unlink && cd ../react-dom && yarn unlink && cd ../jotai && yarn unlink && cd ../framer-motion  && yarn unlink && cd ../lodash  && yarn unlink && cd ../next  && yarn unlink && && cd ../tailwindcss && yarn unlink && cd ../.. && yarn unlink @pooltogether/react-components && yarn unlink @pooltogether/hooks && yarn install --force
